protein.specific_function: E3 Ubiquitin ligase proteins mediate ubiquitination and subsequent proteasomal degradation of target proteins. E3 ubiquitin ligases accept ubiquitin from an E2 ubiquitin- conjugating enzyme in the form of a thioester and then directly transfers the ubiquitin to targeted substrates. Able to specifically bind RNA

reference.reference_text: Kreft SG, Nassal M: hRUL138, a novel human RNA-binding RING-H2 ubiquitin-protein ligase. J Cell Sci. 2003 Feb 15;116(Pt 4):605-16.
